Google 's publicly available embeddings.from sentence: For word vectors we use Google 's publicly available embeddings , trained with word2vec on the 100 - billion - word News corpus .

fixed.from sentence: These vectors are kept fixed throughout training , since we found that training them was not helpful ( likely because of MCTest 's size ) .

0.5.from sentence: We found dropout to be particularly effective at improving generalization from the training to the test set , and used 0.5 as the dropout probability .

learning rate.from sentence: We used the Adam optimizer with the standard settings ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) and a learning rate of 0.003 .

occurs after.from sentence: Dropout occurs after all neural - network transformations , if those transformations are allowed to change with training .
